descriptionlist.description:
Installed to the iWidgets directory: /var/mobile/Library/iWidgets

Tweaks that you can use with:
iWidgets or XenHTML

Widget size info:

This widget comes with 3 different sizes(Folders) for iP5, iP6, iP6+. Delete unwanted sizes if you want to.

Got questions? Contact me on:
Twitter: @Classicxii
Email: classicxii42@gmail.com

changelog.change:
added 网易云音乐(Netease Cloud Music) app for default media player.

Fixed weather chinese language translations.
